programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4844
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep23
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2174
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep4
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: The 42nd Hong Kong Film Awards Red Carpet
programme.desc: Stars and celebrities hit the red carpet ahead of the Awards Ceremony, showing off their best and brightest looks for one of Hong Kongs biggest nights. Follow our live coverage as the superstars deliver their glamourous styles!

programme.title: The 42nd Hong Kong Film Awards
programme.desc: CMM proudly brings you the live coverage of the 42nd Hong Kong Film Awards. Stay tuned and support Hong Kong films!

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled 2046 which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her teams performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chans help.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her fathers restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chus family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeepers daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts Worlds intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.desc: Sethupathy features VIJAY SETHUPATHY & RAMYA NAMBEESAN. It is directed by S.A.Arunkumar & composed by Nivas K Prasanna. It received positive reviews from critics and was a commercial success

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep19
programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep6
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevans successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep7

Everyone thinks he's crazy, but he knows something they don't. And later,vintage slot machines and poker tables send bidding through the roof. The closing price is stratospheric, but what's hidden from sight will be the ultimate payday for one lucky Storage Hunter.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 6
programme.desc: Always up for an outrageous gamble, Uzi and Schlomi throw down the gauntlet in the biggest auction yet. They win two amazing classic cars, but will a hidden surprise in the back of another container propel one of their rivals to an even bigger payday?

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 09
programme.desc: Major Crimes must decide whether a victim was targeted or a potential suicide. Rusty asks Sharon for help as he finally finds Alice Herrera's brother.

programme.title: The Flash S9 9
programme.desc: Team Flash throws a surprise birthday party for Barry (Grant Gustin) but things go terribly awry when Ramsey Rosso (Sendhil Ramamurthy) crashes the festivities.

programme.title: Gotham S1 22
programme.desc: In the season finale, Gotham Citys gang war reaches its boiling point, as Fish Mooney goes head-to-head with Maroni and Penguin in an attempt to restake her claim on the city.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 08
programme.desc: Leonard and Howard enlist Barry Kripke (JOHN ROSS BOWIE) to help after they learn Sheldon betrayed them by working with the military behind their backs.

programme.title: Friends S3 17
programme.desc: A lonely Ross visits Carol when Rachel goes on a ski trip with some friends.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 16
programme.desc: At a cell phone store, Michael reveals an exciting new way to fix your tablet, and later, he makes a drink that's impossible to swallow. Plus, a dog owner loves that Michael has turned her pet into the smartest animal in the world.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 12
programme.desc: It's foul play when the guys work stadium security! Then, the guys contaminate evidence during a crime scene investigation class. Plus, tonight's loser develops multiple personality disorder when opening for Legends in Concert.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: It's lights, camera, action on 20 of the most pinheaded performers ever to take the stage. From lion trainers under attack, to a sexy drum solo and a guy famous for smoking weed. They all share the spotlight with our cast of hilarious comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Britt!

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Get your credit cards ready, because TruTV is coming at you with 20 all new inventions that will both horrify and delight! We've got a loop to make pooping in the woods even more exciting, a way to cool your man parts for optimal baby making, and asound system for the great beyond that will blow the lid off of your coffin. Supplies may be limited, but the jokes from our cast sure aren't, featuring Judy Gold, Jared Logan, and Bryan Callen.

programme.desc: A look at how food factories work, including a look at devilled egg potato salad, puff pastry cheese bites, and chocolate bars.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Defending Wild Dogs - The people going to extraordinary lengths to understand and protect canids, from preventing wild dogs dying of grief in South Africa to protecting the tiny Darwin's fox.

programme.title: The Persians - A History of Iran S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the last episode, Samira Ahmed travels to the crumbling ruins of an ancient walled city and goes back to when Persia faced her gravest threat: Genghis Khan.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep7
programme.desc: Dorset - Ben travels to Dorset to live for a week with Chris, a former paratrooper who has spent the last five years walking Britain's coastline, finding love and raising thousands for charity.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Kenai - Robson grew up hearing tales of the Kenai River in Alaska, and now he's there fulfilling a childhood dream; fishing for salmon on one of the best salmon fishing rivers in the world.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Whales Ep14
programme.desc: Brier Island is at the western point of the Bay of Fundy in Nova Scotia. And in the surrounding waters live an incredible number of humpback whales and dolphins. On still waters, Humpbacks smash their tails, flap their fins, and breach one en masse. Its an incredible sight. A pod of dolphins swims into the Bay of Fundy, feeding off herring. Theyre soon joined by an Orca that capitalizes on their feeding strategies.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 - Breeding Season Ep2
programme.desc: Koalas may seem solitary and inert, but mating season brings a dramatic shift in their behavior, leading to movement, contact, and conflict. As breeding season begins, follow two large males on a mission to mate.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - Aerial Hunters Ep3
programme.desc: Australias birds of prey are some of the region's fiercest predators. These highly specialised killers are powerful, resourceful and striking; they use some impressive weapons to survive. This is the story of Australias aerial hunters.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - The Feathering Nest Ep4
programme.desc: Successful breeding is critical to the survival of any bird species, and in this episode we meet four species of birds which go to exceptional lengths to find mates and raise their young, giving the next generation the best chance of life. Wherever they live, these birds have got their work cut out, holding their territory against invaders, attracting and winning partners and safeguarding their chicks.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Tides of Sweetwater Ep5
programme.desc: A look at the plight of chimpanzees that survive the bush meat trade to become captive animals. At the same time, we look at the reintroduction of colobus monkeys into the Ewaso river area of Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Head & Neck Ep1
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Village Raiders Ep6
programme.desc: Leopard problems plague the community as hunger-ravaged predators roam dangerously close to nearby villages. The team at Ol Pejeta need to safely snare a leopard and relocate it for the good of man and beast.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 - The Journey Begins Ep1
programme.desc: The source of the Mekong River is high up in the Tibetan plateau, from there it flows into Yunnan Province, China, where our journey begins. Even though Yunnan occupies less than 4% of Chinas land, it is home to over half of its birds and mammals.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealands South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweedall following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Relentless Sun Ep7
programme.desc: A once-in-a-generation drought has sucked all the moisture from surrounding rivers and the conservation team is struggling to keep up with the swath of thirsty creatures. While some animals succumb to dehydration, the team must concentrate its efforts on a particularly vulnerable - and dangerous - water buffalo.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 - Laos: the Mountain Wilds Ep2
programme.desc: Laos is a country where most of its western is demarcated by the Mekong River. Being one of the most pristine natural landscapes, Laos plays host to a diverse animal kingdom. Its topography is largely mountainous, and this steep terrain is blanketed by northern Laoss tropical rain and monsoon forests.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

Rick discovers an intriguing tale of deception behind one of the most famous paintings produced here.

programme.desc: Immigration has played a massive role in shaping the food scene of Melbourne. programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2011
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2011 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero but being brave quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep14
programme.desc: Big in Japan - Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep14
programme.desc: Rollodons - When tar fills the cracks of the crater, the Dinotrux must find a way to herd the free-roaming Rollodons to help smooth over the sticky situation.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep14
programme.desc: Boy Boy Girl Band / Lords And Lazers - Tip and Oh try sneaking into a concert but almost destroy Human-Boov relations forever; K-Trong invites Tip and Oh to a make-believe game weekend.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep27
programme.desc: Lucky and La Voltereta Feroz - While Lucky and Spirit struggle to find their place In the circus, Pru and Abigail set out across the frontier to track down their runaway friend

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep28
programme.desc: Lucky and the No-Good Outlaw Butch Lepray - Lucky gets into trouble when the circus picks up a stranded woman who isn't what she seems

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep28
programme.desc: Deus Ex Monkhuaha / Slak Attack - Sandy becomes jealous when the family gets an adorable monkhuahua/Eep and Thunk act like lazy slaks instead of doing their schoolwork and chores

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep29
programme.desc: Gorgey Girl / A Gran Adventure - Eep has the first pen pal in Gulp Gorge/Gran sends Ugga and Eep on the first treasure hunt when she decides to pass on her inheritance

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep43
programme.desc: OCB - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep21
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 1 - As the Dragon Knights prepare to battle for the weapons and control of Tikal, Mastodon attempts to teach Po how to access storm powers to use in the fight. Blade comes face to face with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep22
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 2 - The team heads into a final confrontation for the weapons that not only threatens Tikal, but their lives. And Po must share hero duties with Mastodon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep12
programme.desc: The Liar and The Thief - The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhminis hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years shes been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep40
programme.desc: Defenders Of The Wing Part 2 - Hiccup, Mala, Astrid, Fishlegs, and Snotlout go searching for the now captured Eruptodon, but little do they know that Viggo has a sinister plan.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep40
programme.desc: The Fast and the Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protg./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep40
programme.desc: The All Hail King Julien Show - King Julien launches a new TV channel called Julien-Vision but quickly realizes that the kingdom only wants to watch a reality show of his own life

programme.desc: Clubbing - Homesick, Cleo tries joining some school clubs to feel better. Her homesickness has an unexpected and destructive effect.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep4
programme.desc: Humility - Cleos over confidence gets her friends captured, and to rescue them she must convince a tribe of laidback aliens she can master their high values of humility, serenity, and caution.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep27
programme.desc: Changing Of The Guard - After fruitless searching the universe for Shiro, the Paladins struggle to accept that they must find a new pilot to join the team

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep28
programme.desc: Red Paladin - A new leader of Voltron must be found before Lotor's forces attack.

programme.desc: Jump The Whale Shark / Frederic Bartholdi - When Sherman's friends crash the show for an impromptu beach party, he and his rival both do a trick jump over a whale shark to win over a girl

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep29
programme.desc: Pea Dummy / Mary Anning - When Peabody and Sherman take an intelligence test, Peabody can't believe he scores much lower than Sherman and desperately tries to figure out why

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep1
programme.desc: Stink of Fear: Chapter One - When Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to Paris to enter a cooking competition, Fearless Leader sends super spies Boris and Natasha after Bullwinkle to steal his secret recipe

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep2
programme.desc: Stink of Fear: Chapter Two - While Boris and Natasha continue their mission and Bullwinkle tries to overcome his stage-fright to advance in the cooking competition, a secret government agency begins tracking Rocky & Bullwinkle's movement

programme.desc: A Tiny Problem / Changing Lanes - When Archibald accidentally shrinks himself and Loy, they must work together and brave a challenging course through their giant house. / In an effort to make the bowling league championship more balanced, Arch and Brock switch teams (and families), spending a day in each others (bowling) shoes.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the others daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep11
programme.desc: Mouse - Artephius tries to warn the town when an evil mouse charms his way into San Lorenzo but no one will listen to him.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep11
programme.desc: The Poppy Horror Picture Show / Dinkles Dinkles Little Star - After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep11
programme.desc: Hit or Myth in Greece - When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep11
programme.desc: New Tail - D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove he's still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep11
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Eco Igloo - Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative A Greener Greendale but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep11
programme.desc: Why Frog Croaks - You see there was a time when Frog didn't croak. Frog sang like a bird and the birds didn't like it. Birds were the masters of song and that's the way it should be! So the birds trick poor old Frog into a singing duel and sing and sing and sing until poor old Frog's voice is reduced to a rebbit. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep63
programme.desc: Stingo's Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep11
programme.desc: Rupert Flies to Cheddar Moon - When Ping Pong uses her magic to turn Rupert's pedal car into a spaceship they fly to the moon. There they meet the Man on the Moon who runs a cheese stall.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep11
programme.desc: Tanaka's Moving Castle / Zenko Don't Go - Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep11
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Sam / Toy Driver - Its Tag and Scoochs first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tags old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep11
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Toy Wash - Fuse is heartbroken when his new special toy wash is broken. Right before Revs could have a wash in it too! Noddy decides to investigate and help the little robot find out who has broken it. Using all his investigating skills and collecting evidence with the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that it's his own best beloved car, Revs, who broke the toy wash! Poor Revs thought that if he went through the toy wash he'd miss his special time with Noddy and Bumpy. Noddy finds a way for Revs to enjoy the toy wash AND still has his special playtime with his best friends. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep15
programme.desc: A New York Minute - Odlulu is overwhelmed by the pace of NYC, so she uses the Slo-Mo Key to make the city move at a snail's pace. When the key's effects threaten a marathon, Waldo and Wenda are determined to get it back. The Wanderers must pursue Odlulu to save the marathon.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep15
programme.desc: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad - Chet is determined to open a giant can of tomato juice lands in town and Turbo worries that Chet is becoming obsessed with the can. // Turbo donates his race winnings an animal charity, but accidentally adopts a toad who moves into the clubhouse and becomes an obnoxious house guest.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep15
programme.desc: Lair - D-Structs kidnaps Revvit to show the crew who's boss when they compete over construction, so Ty plans the perfect heist to rescue their friend.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep15
programme.desc: Tip's Deep Dish / Garbage Day - When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep29
programme.desc: Lucky and the Big Goodbye - While Lucky attempts to win over a town that is unwelcoming to the circus, she starts to question her own reasoning to stay

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep30
programme.desc: Lucky and the Two-Wheeled Terror - When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep30
programme.desc: 127 Owwws / 28 Fleas Later - Eep and Thunk become obsessed with a new trend known as quicktogramming/Grug accidentally causes the first outbreak of a super bug

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep31
programme.desc: To Squawk With Love / Lerk Was The Night - Eep & Thunk cheer up Squawk to avoid the first final exam/Eep and Lerk venture to the Garden of Eaten after the Broods spike the Watering Hole

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep20
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist - The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep21
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 1 - As the Dragon Knights prepare to battle for the weapons and control of Tikal, Mastodon attempts to teach Po how to access storm powers to use in the fight. Blade comes face to face with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep22
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 2 - The team heads into a final confrontation for the weapons that not only threatens Tikal, but their lives. And Po must share hero duties with Mastodon.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Novas toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.desc: Jolly Lodgers / Biddy Sitting - Squidward packs his bags after his house gets infested, but a different kind of pest waits at his hotel. // SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep254
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 1 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.desc: Code Yellow - Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital, and SpongeBob tags along as moral support.

programme.desc: Guardians of the Ponytail - Danger Force is hired by Rivalton's Duke Wellington to protect him and his ponytail from his jealous uncle, Archduke Fernando. They at first think it's easy money, until they find out The Archduke hired Ray and Henry Hart to capture Duke Wellington.

programme.title: Danger Force S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Miles Sells His Soul - In an effort to help Mika defeat her rival in a riff-off, Miles sells his soul to a suave demon who lives in The Man's Nest Abyss Room. CaptainMan must face the demon in a Ukulele-Log-Rolling competitionin order to get all the kids' souls back.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep108

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Bad Business / Anniversorry - Sammy are Hugo are running for Junior Business Club President, but when the votes come in they are tied...// Dada and Dadi's anniversary party is at the same time as arcade night! Can the boys find a way to be in two places at once?

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Late for Breakfast / Bummer Jobs - Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast. // Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce.

programme.desc: Shrinking Stars / FitzPatrick - The Star family finds themselves getting smaller and smaller. // Patrick's evil twin cousin shows up to ruin Patrick' reputation.

programme.desc: Shell Games / Senior Discount - Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle who overslept. // Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Fails from the Crypt / Bad Cluck - A haunted chicken is pestering the Casagrandes - but is he just here for Sergio? // The kids try to break a local record for staying in the cemetery overnight!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Skaters Gonna Hate - Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep206
programme.desc: Unreal Estate / Code Yellow - When SpongeBob thinks he's allergic to his pineapple, Squidward offers to help find him a new home. // Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital, and SpongeBob tags along as moral support.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep207
programme.desc: Mimic Madness / House Worming - SpongeBob learns that "imitation is the sincerest form of flattery" - too bad no one told him how to stop! // When worms move in to SpongeBob's holes, it's up to him to hide his disgusting new friends from everyone else.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Shrinking Stars / FitzPatrick - The Star family finds themselves getting smaller and smaller. // Patrick's evil twin cousin shows up to ruin Patrick' reputation.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep208

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep209
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Place / Plankton Gets the Boot - When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant and head for SpongeBob's Place. // When Plankton gets kicked out of the house, it's up to SpongeBob to teach him how to win his computer wife back.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep210

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 300: Pereira vs. Hill
programme.desc: Main Event - Over 30 years in the making, UFC 300 is finally here on April 14, complete with three title fights and a card stacked from top to bottom with mixed martial arts biggest stars. In the main event at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, Jamahal Hill attempts to regain the title he never lost in the Octagon when he meets light heavyweight king Alex Pereira. Plus, an all-China showdown pits strawweight champion Zhang Weili against top contenderYan Xiaonan, and the BMF title is on the line when Justin Gaethje faces off with Max Holloway

programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4.
